message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to purchase this unique product.  Its value is significant, and I believe it would be a worthwhile investment for you. To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is only $1,000,000 to you.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but your offer is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  The product has substantial inherent value. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it.
